experiences: CubeSat Satellite Development: Attitude Determination and Control Systems (ADCS) Team Member
System Design & Documentation: Utilized PlantUML to create detailed system diagrams, streamlining the design process for the CubeSat satellite project.
Code Development: Developed and integrated key software sections to support critical satellite functions.
Project Timeline: The CubeSat satellite is slated for launch in 2026/2027.
GNCTR 2025: Superstructure & Lighting Systems, Project Coordination
Design Input for Superstructure: Provided conceptual feedback and ideas that helped shape the overall design direction of the superstructure in collaboration with the engineering team.
3D Modeling & Prototyping: Designed a precise, 3D-printable model for the toboggan headlights cover using OnShape, ensuring structural integrity and compatibility with the 3D printing process.
LED Integration & Hardware Implementation: Implemented an LED headlights system by integrating an Arduino to manage connections between the power source and the control switch.
Software Development: Developed a custom C++ program that automates the switching mechanism, enabling reliable on/off control of the LED system.
